price: 55. In een zitting van waarheid in de nabijheid van de ware Koning die tot alles in staat is.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
